title: Brazil : voting intention for 2018 presidential elections , by candidate
summary: This is a grouped bar chart showing SOME LABEL on the Y-axis throughout 30 Months for Situation A, and Situation B on the X-axis.
Over the 30 Months, the SOME LABEL for Situation A have been decreased whereas risen for Month.
Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT) had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 2 groups, and it was for Situation A. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Month Don't know for Situation A.
In Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT), Situation A had the maximum SOME LABEL and it saw the lowest in Month Don't know out of all 30 Months.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents SOME LABEL on the Y-axis. And, how the value changed throughout 30 Months for Situation A, and Situation B.
Over the 30 Months, the SOME LABEL for Situation A have been decreased whereas risen for Month.
mid_summary: This is a grouped bar chart showing SOME LABEL on the Y-axis throughout 30 Months for Situation A, and Situation B on the X-axis.
Over the 30 Months, the SOME LABEL for Situation A have been decreased whereas risen for Month.
Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT) had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 2 groups, and it was for Situation A. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Month Don't know for Situation A.

max_summary: This is a grouped bar chart showing SOME LABEL on the Y-axis throughout 30 Months for Situation A, and Situation B on the X-axis.
All through the Months, the SOME LABEL for Situation A have decreased. On the other hand, for Month the SOME LABEL have risen.
Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT) had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 2 groups, and it was for Situation A. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Month Don't know for Situation A.
Among all the Months, Situation A had the highest SOME LABEL 39.0 in Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT) and lowest value 0.0 in Month Don't know.
There is a gap of 38.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for Situation A in Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT) and Don't know.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum SOME LABEL was found in case of Situation A.
On average, the Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT) had the highest SOME LABEL for all 2 groups Situation A, and Situation B. Whereas João Goulart Filho (PPL) had the lowest average SOME LABEL.

data.Month: Blank or voided ballots / No vote
